0.text: Innate: Periodically, Aatrox empowers his next basic attack to gain  50 bonus range and deal bonus physical damage equal to 5% − 12% (based on level) of the target's maximum health, capped at 100 against  monsters. Aatrox  heals for 100% of the post-mitigation damage dealt, reduced to 25% against  minions.
0.html:
Innate: Periodically, Aatrox empowers his next basic attack to gain  50 bonus range and deal bonus physical damage equal to 5% − 12% (based on level) of the target's maximum health, capped at 100 against monsters.
Aatrox heals for 100% of the post-mitigation damage dealt, reduced to 25% against minions.
markedPassages: 50 bonus range
5% − 12% (based on level) of the target's maximum health
5% − 12% (based on level) of the target's maximum health
monsters
heals
minions

1.text: Whenever Aatrox hits at least one enemy  champion or large  monster with a basic attack  on-hit or an ability, the cooldown of Deathbringer Stance is  reduced by 2 seconds, modified to 4 if he hits with the Sweetspot of  The Darkin Blade.
1.html: Whenever Aatrox hits at least one enemy champion or large monster with a basic attack on-hit or an ability, the cooldown of Deathbringer Stance is  reduced by 2 seconds, modified to 4 if he hits with the Sweetspot of The Darkin Blade.
markedPassages: champion
monster
on-hit
reduced
The Darkin Blade

0.text: Active: Aatrox can activate The Darkin Blade three times before the ability goes on cooldown, with a 1 second static cooldown between casts. If Aatrox does not recast the ability within 4 seconds of the previous cast, it goes on cooldown.
0.html: Active: Aatrox can activate The Darkin Blade three times before the ability goes on cooldown, with a 1 second static cooldown between casts. If Aatrox does not recast the ability within 4 seconds of the previous cast, it goes on cooldown.

1.text: Aatrox performs a strike with his greatsword for each of the three casts, dealing physical damage to enemies hit within an area. Enemies hit within a Sweetspot of the area take  60% bonus damage and also  knocked up for 0.25 seconds. Each subsequent cast increases The Darkin Blade's damage by 25%.
1.html: Aatrox performs a strike with his greatsword for each of the three casts, dealing physical damage to enemies hit within an area. Enemies hit within a Sweetspot of the area take 60% bonus damage and also knocked up for 0.25 seconds. Each subsequent cast increases The Darkin Blade's damage by 25%.
markedPassages: knocked up

2.text: First Cast: Aatrox's first strike affects a 625 × 180-unit rectangular area in the target direction, with him centered on the back line and the Sweetspot at the farthest edge.
2.html: First Cast: Aatrox's first strike affects a 625 × 180-unit rectangular area in the target direction, with him centered on the back line and the Sweetspot at the farthest edge.

3.text: Second Cast: Aatrox's second strike affects a trapezoidal area in the target direction, with the Sweetspot at the farthest edge. The hitbox begins 100-units behind Aatrox and extends 475-units in front of him, measuring between 300 and 500-units wide from behind to in front.
3.html: Second Cast: Aatrox's second strike affects a trapezoidal area in the target direction, with the Sweetspot at the farthest edge. The hitbox begins 100-units behind Aatrox and extends 475-units in front of him, measuring between 300 and 500-units wide from behind to in front.

4.text: Third Cast: Aatrox's third strike affects a 300-radius circular area centered on a target location that is 200 units in front of him, with a 180-radius Sweetspot within.
4.html: Third Cast: Aatrox's third strike affects a 300-radius circular area centered on a target location that is 200 units in front of him, with a 180-radius Sweetspot within.

5.text: The Darkin Blade deals 55% damage against  minions, and the  knock up duration from hitting the Sweetspot is doubled to 0.5 seconds against  monsters.
5.html: The Darkin Blade deals 55% damage against minions, and the knock up duration from hitting the Sweetspot is doubled to 0.5 seconds against monsters.
markedPassages: minions
knock up
monsters

0.text: Active: Aatrox sends a chain in the target direction that deals physical damage to the first enemy hit, doubled against  minions, and  slowing them by 25% for 1.5 seconds.
0.html: Active: Aatrox sends a chain in the target direction that deals physical damage to the first enemy hit, doubled against minions, and slowing them by 25% for 1.5 seconds.
markedPassages: minions
slowing

1.text: If this hits an enemy  champion or large  monster, a  tether is formed between the target and the ground beneath them for 1.5 seconds, during which they are  revealed.
1.html: If this hits an enemy champion or large monster, a tether is formed between the target and the ground beneath them for 1.5 seconds, during which they are revealed.
markedPassages: champion
monster
tether
revealed

2.text: If the tether is not broken by the end of its duration, the target is dealt the same physical damage again and  pulled to the center of the area.
2.html: If the tether is not broken by the end of its duration, the target is dealt the same physical damage again and pulled to the center of the area.
markedPassages: pulled

0.text: Passive: Aatrox  heals for a portion of the non- persistent post-mitigation damage he deals against enemy champions, increased during  World Ender.
0.html: Passive: Aatrox heals for a portion of the non- persistent post-mitigation damage he deals against enemy champions, increased during World Ender.
markedPassages: heals
persistent
World Ender
World Ender

1.text: Active: Aatrox  dashes in the target direction.
1.html: Active: Aatrox dashes in the target direction.
markedPassages: dashes

2.text: Umbral Dash  resets Aatrox's basic attack timer and can be cast during his other abilities without cancelling them and vice versa.
2.html: Umbral Dash resets Aatrox's basic attack timer and can be cast during his other abilities without cancelling them and vice versa.
markedPassages: resets
possibleConcerningAbilities: Umbral Dash  resets Aatrox's basic attack timer and can be cast during his other abilities without cancelling them and vice versa.

0.text: Active: Aatrox unleashes his true form for 10 seconds,  fearing nearby enemy  minions and  monsters for 3 seconds, during which they are gradually  slowed by up to 99% over the duration. He also gains  ghosting and  bonus movement speed that decays by 10% of the current bonus every 0.25 seconds, lasting until World Ender has ended.
0.html: Active: Aatrox unleashes his true form for 10 seconds, fearing nearby enemy minions and monsters for 3 seconds, during which they are gradually slowed by up to 99% over the duration. He also gains ghosting and  bonus movement speed that decays by 10% of the current bonus every 0.25 seconds, lasting until World Ender has ended.
markedPassages: fearing
minions
monsters
slowed
ghosting
bonus movement speed

1.text: Whenever Aatrox scores a champion  takedown, he extends the duration by 5 seconds and becomes unleashed again.
1.html: Whenever Aatrox scores a champion takedown, he extends the duration by 5 seconds and becomes unleashed again.
markedPassages: takedown

2.text: During World Ender, Aatrox gains  bonus attack damage and 5% increased size, and receives increased  self-healing from all sources.
2.html: During World Ender, Aatrox gains  bonus attack damage and 5% increased size, and receives increased self-healing from all sources.
markedPassages: bonus attack damage
bonus attack damage
self-healing

textContent.text: Innate: Periodically, Aatrox empowers his next basic attack to gain  50 bonus range and deal bonus physical damage equal to 5% − 12% (based on level) of the target's maximum health, capped at 100 against  monsters. Aatrox  heals for 100% of the post-mitigation damage dealt, reduced to 25% against  minions.

skillTabs.concerningText: First Cast: Aatrox's first strike affects a 625 × 180-unit rectangular area in the target direction, with him centered on the back line and the Sweetspot at the farthest edge.
First Cast: Aatrox's first strike affects a 625 × 180-unit rectangular area in the target direction, with him centered on the back line and the Sweetspot at the farthest edge.

textContent.text: Second Cast: Aatrox's second strike affects a trapezoidal area in the target direction, with the Sweetspot at the farthest edge. The hitbox begins 100-units behind Aatrox and extends 475-units in front of him, measuring between 300 and 500-units wide from behind to in front.
textContent.html: Second Cast: Aatrox's second strike affects a trapezoidal area in the target direction, with the Sweetspot at the farthest edge. The hitbox begins 100-units behind Aatrox and extends 475-units in front of him, measuring between 300 and 500-units wide from behind to in front.

skillTabs.concerningText: Second Cast: Aatrox's second strike affects a trapezoidal area in the target direction, with the Sweetspot at the farthest edge. The hitbox begins 100-units behind Aatrox and extends 475-units in front of him, measuring between 300 and 500-units wide from behind to in front.

Second Cast: Aatrox's second strike affects a trapezoidal area in the target direction, with the Sweetspot at the farthest edge. The hitbox begins 100-units behind Aatrox and extends 475-units in front of him, measuring between 300 and 500-units wide from behind to in front.

textContent.text: Third Cast: Aatrox's third strike affects a 300-radius circular area centered on a target location that is 200 units in front of him, with a 180-radius Sweetspot within.
textContent.html: Third Cast: Aatrox's third strike affects a 300-radius circular area centered on a target location that is 200 units in front of him, with a 180-radius Sweetspot within.

skillTabs.concerningText: Third Cast: Aatrox's third strike affects a 300-radius circular area centered on a target location that is 200 units in front of him, with a 180-radius Sweetspot within.
Third Cast: Aatrox's third strike affects a 300-radius circular area centered on a target location that is 200 units in front of him, with a 180-radius Sweetspot within.

textContent.text: The Darkin Blade deals 55% damage against  minions, and the  knock up duration from hitting the Sweetspot is doubled to 0.5 seconds against  monsters.
textContent.html: The Darkin Blade deals 55% damage against minions, and the knock up duration from hitting the Sweetspot is doubled to 0.5 seconds against monsters.

skillTabs.concerningText: The Darkin Blade deals 55% damage against  minions, and the  knock up duration from hitting the Sweetspot is doubled to 0.5 seconds against  monsters.

textContent.text: Active: Aatrox sends a chain in the target direction that deals physical damage to the first enemy hit, doubled against  minions, and  slowing them by 25% for 1.5 seconds.
textContent.html: Active: Aatrox sends a chain in the target direction that deals physical damage to the first enemy hit, doubled against minions, and slowing them by 25% for 1.5 seconds.

skillTabs.concerningText: Active: Aatrox sends a chain in the target direction that deals physical damage to the first enemy hit, doubled against  minions, and  slowing them by 25% for 1.5 seconds.
Active: Aatrox sends a chain in the target direction that deals physical damage to the first enemy hit, doubled against  minions, and  slowing them by 25% for 1.5 seconds.

textContent.text: If this hits an enemy  champion or large  monster, a  tether is formed between the target and the ground beneath them for 1.5 seconds, during which they are  revealed.
textContent.html: If this hits an enemy champion or large monster, a tether is formed between the target and the ground beneath them for 1.5 seconds, during which they are revealed.

textContent.text: If the tether is not broken by the end of its duration, the target is dealt the same physical damage again and  pulled to the center of the area.
textContent.html: If the tether is not broken by the end of its duration, the target is dealt the same physical damage again and pulled to the center of the area.

skillTabs.concerningText: If the tether is not broken by the end of its duration, the target is dealt the same physical damage again and  pulled to the center of the area.

textContent.text: Passive: Aatrox  heals for a portion of the non- persistent post-mitigation damage he deals against enemy champions, increased during  World Ender.
textContent.html: Passive: Aatrox heals for a portion of the non- persistent post-mitigation damage he deals against enemy champions, increased during World Ender.

skillTabs.concerningText: Passive: Aatrox  heals for a portion of the non- persistent post-mitigation damage he deals against enemy champions, increased during  World Ender.
Passive: Aatrox  heals for a portion of the non- persistent post-mitigation damage he deals against enemy champions, increased during  World Ender.

textContent.text: Active: Aatrox  dashes in the target direction.
textContent.html: Active: Aatrox dashes in the target direction.

textContent.text: Umbral Dash  resets Aatrox's basic attack timer and can be cast during his other abilities without cancelling them and vice versa.
textContent.html: Umbral Dash resets Aatrox's basic attack timer and can be cast during his other abilities without cancelling them and vice versa.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Umbral Dash  resets Aatrox's basic attack timer and can be cast during his other abilities without cancelling them and vice versa.

concerningSkills.skillName: umbral dash resets aatrox's basic attack timer and can be cast during his other abilities without cancelling them and vice versa.

textContent.text: Active: Aatrox unleashes his true form for 10 seconds,  fearing nearby enemy  minions and  monsters for 3 seconds, during which they are gradually  slowed by up to 99% over the duration. He also gains  ghosting and  bonus movement speed that decays by 10% of the current bonus every 0.25 seconds, lasting until World Ender has ended.
textContent.html: Active: Aatrox unleashes his true form for 10 seconds, fearing nearby enemy minions and monsters for 3 seconds, during which they are gradually slowed by up to 99% over the duration. He also gains ghosting and  bonus movement speed that decays by 10% of the current bonus every 0.25 seconds, lasting until World Ender has ended.

skillTabs.concerningText: Active: Aatrox unleashes his true form for 10 seconds,  fearing nearby enemy  minions and  monsters for 3 seconds, during which they are gradually  slowed by up to 99% over the duration. He also gains  ghosting and  bonus movement speed that decays by 10% of the current bonus every 0.25 seconds, lasting until World Ender has ended.

textContent.text: Whenever Aatrox scores a champion  takedown, he extends the duration by 5 seconds and becomes unleashed again.
textContent.html: Whenever Aatrox scores a champion takedown, he extends the duration by 5 seconds and becomes unleashed again.

textContent.text: During World Ender, Aatrox gains  bonus attack damage and 5% increased size, and receives increased  self-healing from all sources.
textContent.html: During World Ender, Aatrox gains  bonus attack damage and 5% increased size, and receives increased self-healing from all sources.
